product_name: GSI Outdoors Glacier Stainless Stemless Wineglass
long_description: Pop the cork on your favorite vintage and fill up the GSI Glacier Stainless Stemless wineglass on your next camping trip. Stainless-steel construction gleams with quality craftsmanship. Stemless design creates a low center of gravity for great stability on most surfaces. Slight bulge towards the bottom of the glass gives you a secure grip and also helps prevent the glass from tipping over. Glass holds 10 fl. oz.
short_description: Pop the cork on your favorite vintage and fill up the GSI Glacier Stainless Stemless wineglass on your next camping trip.
